player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction of a player. This is the class which link all the class like cards, pick and bank by actions.
    Author:
    bpotiron

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Pick pick,
              Bank bank,
              Game game)
        Constructor for a player.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player
        pick - the pick where the player can draw cards and make other actions
        bank - the bank where the player get and put his coins.
        game - the game where the player is involved

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor used only for non human players (like the trash player)
        Parameters:
        name - correspond to the name of the player

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public District drawCard()
        The player draw a card in the pick. The card is in his hand.
        Returns:
        District the district add in the deck of the player

      • throwCard

        public void throwCard(District d)
        The player throw a card of his deck to the pick
        Parameters:
        d - the card to throw

      • throwCard

        public void throwCard(int i)
        The player throw a card of his deck to the pick
        Parameters:
        i - corresponding to the rank of the card in the arrayList representing the deck

      • buildDistrict

        public void buildDistrict(District c)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The player build a district. The district is removed from is hand and goes to his city (visible by the other player). His coins are credited by the price of the district and the money goes to the bank. Pre condition : the district to add doesn't alreasy exist in the city of the player.
        Parameters:
        c - correspond to the card of the district to build
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the player has not enough money or when he tries to build a district that he already have in his city

      • districtNotInCity

        private boolean districtNotInCity(District d)
        This method verify the pre-condition to build a district in the city of the player. The district should not exist already in the city.
        Parameters:
        d - the district
        Returns:
        true if the district in parameter is not in the city of the player. Else return false.

      • destroyDistrict

        public void destroyDistrict(District d)
        Method used by the condottiere to destroy the district of the city of another player
        Parameters:
        d - the district to destroy in the city of the player

      • getCity

        public java.util.ArrayList<District> getCity()
        return the arrayList containing all the city builds by the player
        Returns:
        the city of the player

      • NbOfFamilyDistrictsInCity

        public int NbOfFamilyDistrictsInCity(Family f)
        When a character (king for example) begin a round, he can have 1 gold for each district of the king family (nobility). This method return the number of district of the f family in the city of the player
        Parameters:
        f - the family of the character played
        Returns:
        the number of districts of the f family in the city of the player

      • getDeck

        public java.util.ArrayList<District> getDeck()
        return the arrayList containing all the city builds by the player
        Returns:
        the city of the player

      • replaceDeck

        public void replaceDeck(java.util.ArrayList<District> deckOther)
        Method used when a magician want to replace his deck with another player
        Parameters:
        deckOther - the new deck of the player

      • nbCard

        public int nbCard()
        Returns:
        the number of cards in the deck of the player

      • setProtectionFromCondottiere

        public void setProtectionFromCondottiere(boolean b)
        Set the attribute corresponding to the protection from condottiere to true or false, depends of the param.
        Parameters:
        b - set the attribute to true or false respectively if the player is protected or not from the condottiere.

      • isProtectedFromCondottiere

        public boolean isProtectedFromCondottiere()
        Returns:
        true if the player is protected from the condottiere (if the player played the bishop character during the round). Else return false.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Return the name of the player
        Returns:
        the name/pseudo of the player

      • getCoins

        public int getCoins()
        Get the number of coins of the player
        Returns:
        integer correspond to the number of coins of the player

      • getCoinsFromBank

        public void getCoinsFromBank(int i)
        Give coins to the player (coins are removed from the bank)
        Parameters:
        i - number of coins to add

      • addCoins

        private boolean addCoins(int i)
        Add coins to the account of the player
        Parameters:
        i - number of coin to add
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful

      • removeCoins

        private boolean removeCoins(int i)
        Remove coins to the account of the player
        Parameters:
        i - number of coin to remove
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful

      • removeCoinsFromPlayer

        public void removeCoinsFromPlayer(int i)
        Remove coins to the player and put them in the bank
        Parameters:
        i - number of coins to remove

      • removeCoinsToOtherPlayer

        public void removeCoinsToOtherPlayer(int i,
                                     Player p)
        This method remove coins to the player specified in parameter and give them to the current player (this)
        Parameters:
        i - correspond to the number of coins to take
        p - the player which will loose money

      • hasBuild8Districts

        public boolean hasBuild8Districts()
        Method returning a boolean which correspond to the status of the game.
        Returns:
        true if the player have finish to build 8 districts

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore()
        Calculate the score of the player (at the end of the game)
        Returns:
        the score of the player
